security: Dissemination controls and destruction notice indicate need to protect the information.  The reference to 'RYBATWOMUSE' suggests the content relates to sensitive intelligence operations or sources.
summary: A message indicates that two copies of a photograph were sent to POSSON via APO on April 19. The message includes routing information and dissemination controls.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET message, dated April 19, 1968, indicates that two copies of a photograph were sent to POSSON via APO. The message includes routing and initial information for James P. Burke and NESA/COPS, specifies 'RYBATWOMUSE', cites Director: 92897, references Director: 92664 para 2, and notes dissemination controls, including destruction of the document.
title: Message regarding photograph sent to POSSON
